Material used.Description: SH-SY5Y cells were stably overexpressing DMT1 and/or α-synuclein (wild type or mutant).

Readout description.Result Description: Baseline Fe²⁺ uptake and cell death rates observed in cells overexpressing DMT1 alone.
Mutant α-synuclein exacerbated Fe²⁺-induced cell death, oxidative stress, and DNA damage compared to wild type.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Cells overexpressing DMT1 alone served as positive controls for Fe²⁺ uptake assessment.

Basic negative control.Description: Untransfected SH-SY5Y cells served as negative controls.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Cell death rate <20% under baseline conditions

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Cell death rate >50% with mutant α-synuclein co-expression
